content:
I think I've got a good idea of how I've been using social media lately, thanks for the questions! I've been using Telegram to chat with some friends who live abroad, and I've also been using Signal to communicate with a few friends who are more privacy-conscious. 

I've been trying to be more mindful of my social media use, setting limits on how much time I spend scrolling through my feeds. I've been using website blockers to help me stay focused, and I've been trying to engage more with others in a more meaningful way, rather than just liking and scrolling past posts.

It's been a bit of a challenge, but I feel like I'm making progress. Oh, and I did have a bit of a mishap on social media about two weeks ago - I accidentally posted a screenshot of a private conversation on Instagram, and it caused some drama with my friends. I ended up apologizing and deleting the post, but it was a good lesson in being more careful
